column8: Hi I have some questions about how the Amanah Saham Bumiputera works?A bumiputera can buy it at RM1.00/unit.1)When the annual dividends get paid, is the dividend rate on the (RM 1.00 * units you hold)? Or is on the (NAV * units you hold?)2)When you want to sell all ASB units, do you sell it at RM 1.00/unit? Or is the selling price the NAV?3)Can a bumiputera just buy/sell whenever he/she wants to? 4)What is the point of NAV in unit trusts?
well, u need asb's prospectus book. Acquire from whose have. BTW, i have asb, but i burn the book. sorry try not to be hoarder.
